page.title: 11EDUCATION - BURGHFIELD
page.content: Burghfield St. Marys School provides primary education for children from five to eleven years with a complete range of subjects including computers. Miss Tunbridge, the Headteacher, thinks French is an important preparation for secondary school. She also thinks computers are very important in preparing people for secondary school. She thinks project work should promote interest in other people, knowledge of other countries and a questioning attitude towards life. The sort of person she would like to see going up to secondary school is a confident happy person who cares for other people and enjoys working hard. She is quite happy with education but thinks it is affected by limitations of space both outdoors and indoors. We have close links with the church and do our concerts there.
